column5: Hello Gang,  Sorry for the late report.....  Had friends come up to the lake with hopes of trying our Musky luck again last weekend. Man oh man was the fishing tuff. We fished for 5 hours Saturday and managed nothing but one major "SWIPE" at our lures. Boated NADDA !  Sunday, we tried our luck again and hit nothing for the first 3 hours. We then decided to try our luck on another section of the lake and within 30 mins, we boated 2 nice skis and one gorgeous pic. The pic weighed in just over 7 pounds and smacked a 10 inch believer. Unreal !!  Here are the pics:          Thanks for reading,  Meely
Very Nice catches.  Beauty pickeral.  seems like your having a great season thus far, keep it up!
Great report and pics Meely  Nice skis and great looking eye  Thanks for sharing Leechman
Thats a nice Wally.. and on a 10" believer to boot! Congrads..
Very nice pickerel there.  For tuff fishing, two ski's are better than none  Nice report.  Joey
Nice to hear from our favourite Calabrese once again.  Great pics, Emilio.
WOW, three nice fish, good work...
Meely my arms are still sore from tending to the lines!  Sure was tuff fishing

At least you caught some decent fish there on Sunday. Congrats!  Was up there on Saturday as well and caught no muskies that day as well. Trolled the deep water north of Big Island for a few hours, before the wind blew up and forced us down to the back channel. Tried for bass with the usual spnnerbaits and topwaters on good spots. Nada! Caught some bass on grubs/jig rippin weeds however.  Think i saw youse guys, we were in reddish brown tinny up by Hurricane Point. No one else was really fishing there on a Saturday in mid- August.  Nice fish anyways, ehg
You did very well !!! some very decent muskies,and a very nice walleye for sure,great job guys !!!...cheers
Another nice report Meely, thanx for sharing. Youz guyz gotts it figured out.
Great report, thats a really nice 'eye!!!
Very nice! Thats a monster pickerel! I may be goin to pigeon this weekend! Thanks for sharing.
